title: FS: t206 Whitey Alperman PSA 1.5 SC 150/fact. 649 op SOLD
author: Kzoo

posts.post_title: FS: t206 Whitey Alperman PSA 1.5 SC 150/fact. 649 op SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale is a t206 card of Whitey Alperman that has been graded PSA 1.5 Fair. The card has good color and a nice image, but rounded corners. I see a couple small creases on the right border. There is a little bit of tape residue on the back of the plastic case that I could not remove.

$SOLD shipped via Paypal 'Gift'/ FF. Please PM with questions. Thanks.
